full_text: Robert Mercer Taliaferro Hunter  was an American lawyer and politician from Virginia. He was a U.S. Representative , Speaker of the House , and U.S. Senator . During the American Civil War he was Confederate States Secretary of State  and then a Confederate Senator . After the war, he served as Treasurer of Virginia , and customs collector in 1885 until his death.
title: Robert M. T. Hunter
